title: WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK RIOT EXPLAIN THIS TO ME?
body: PLEASE WTF IS THIS? -35LP for ONE LOSS? WTF? before you say i have bad MMR , the enemy team are mostly dia 5 and plat 1 SO WTF DO I GET -35? is this system screwed up or what??????????

replies.body:
You're struggling to keep a 50% winrate which means you really do not belong where you are, the system is trying to get you out of Diamond and unless you actually get a decent winrate it will continue to give you high LP losses.

Enough with these dumb threads already, you DO have shitty MMR, you cannot compete against those in Diamond V, simple, you don't belong there.

lol I've seen people with 20-30 wins over loss and they are in the same situation as me, if i am winning and losing the same amount of game it seems make sense that i am at where I belong, if I dont belong in a certain tier, I would LOSE more than WIN, but this is not the case for me

Don't compare others games to yours, everyone's is different because it depends on how you've climbed.

No, that's not what it means at all, it means you're struggling where you are because you're barely keeping a 50% winrate, the system recognizes this and is trying to drop you to a level where you can compete well.

Stop trying to argue this point, your LP loss has proved all of this and don't blame Riots system because there's nothing wrong with it.
I do know things, Riot have even said how the system works, stop being a dick for no reason.
no you don't. the system is broken. many people have this issue. pls stop trying to be a hero b0ss. vry gud b0ss
Yes i do, no it isn't, its not an "issue" its people not belonging where they are, for instance you belong in bronze :)

Man you are dumb, keep kidding yourself, everyone knows you're shit at this game, your opinion means nothing right now because everything you're saying has been proven wrong, so you are wrong, i'm done with you, good day :)
why are you so upset b0ss?, you should do some meditation b0ss. release that stress 4 u b0ss

>dia 5 and plat 1

That doesn't mean any of them actually have good MMR.

you
have
bad
m
m
r

Typical OP constantly stuck in the denial stage unable to accept the fact their mmr is shittier then an adam sandler movie, no but the enemy team tho, but this, but that. LoL the only reason to lose so much is SHIT MMR face the facts lol rather then disagreeing with anyone who says that and hoping everyone will join your side.
fuck you, adam sandler is great
Adam Sandler is shit and his new movie is even shittier.

*Puts on le monacle* ahem
gitgud
Awwwww but I thought only people in Bronze lost that amount of LP so other players could laugh at them because they got rekt? Hmmmm you are not allowed to complain about it, no no no.
I SURE DID BY RIOT'S POS MM SYSTEM
More like by your piece of shit winrate for a Diamond.

It could either be that you surrendered which makes you lose more Lp or that you have a high win rate win which makes you lose more I think. If it isn't any of that I don't know the ranked system for league of legends is really weird. No one will ever fully understand the ranked system.

Surrendering doesn't make you lose more LP and having a high winrate does the opposate of losing more LP, the higher the winrate the less LP you lose.

We do understand how the ranked system works, Riot have even explained how the system works, its just people refuse to accept shit and they end up getting mad and make dumb posts over and over again.
Nah didn't surrender

You're Diamond V too, so what's strange about meeting Diamond Vs and Plat 1s?

It's just you having bad MMR.
So what is considered the average MMR? because i thought its only normal for d5 to vs other d5's and high plat, -35lp makes me feel like that I am losing game to plat 5's and high golds

Every elo bracket has its own MMR requirement, I don't know what's needed for D5 but if you have low MMR but still get matched with D5s that can be because your teammates have it high so it evens out or something.

>dia 5 and plat 1

That doesn't mean any of them actually have good MMR.
